𓆑 ϥⲉ que ⇔ de

𓆙 ⋍ 𓆑 ≠ 𓆑 worm dissimilar sign?

𓆑 ϥvr > kvr > wer > er > el il lui
𓆑 ϥvr > kur > her 𒄯 ḪAR 𒄯 ur₅ er "he" one that same who
𓆑 ϥvr > qvo > who > he

𓆑 ƒ < who < ver < wer < worm 𒄵 bir 𒄯 ur₅ er

𓆑 ⋍ ውእቱ ⋍ wəʾətu ⇔ 𓇓𓅱𓏏 “he”

WER/WEM synthesis : 𐍅𐌰𐌿𐍂𐌼𐍃 ⇔ 𓆑 𓈖 𓍿 ( 𓈖 nem/men 𓍿 tc > 𐍃 )

The most ambivalent and elusive letter of the Alphabet, prominent in 𓎡𓆑𓍘𓅱 K𓆑t𓅱 Crete (𓆑=kur)

  • F/V 𓇌 feather-viper𓆑 𓇋
  • Ph Phython=:ϝ PhSn φϑ ظ ψ ps pth > bev : 𓂝𓂋𓆑𓍮 = ערבב irbév
  • QV qva que... 4 ⋍ 𓆑𓂧𓅱 ЧⲦⲞⲞⲨ ⋍ qvtour = 4 ⇔ Cobra? Ч ⋍ 𐡊 kappa 𓆑=kur
  • √syn 𓆑 sin snake 𓂝 𓆑 𓏏 𓆓 𓊭||chest (furniture)|صَنْدُوق ṣandūq ⇔ 𓋴 𓅱 𓎛 𓏏 𓆱 | coffin | 𓇓𓅱 ?
  • snake ⋍ sangue 𓊃 𓈖 𓆑 𓂐 𓏥 (blood)
  1. ϝ reflexive pronoun 𓆑 Ph ⇔ 𓊪𓏲 whos whon vhiss which wo ou वह (he who)
  2. ϝ reflexive pronoun 𓆑 Sn (wo)sein ⇔ diesen dessen
  3. Ч reflexive pronoun 𓆑 Ч who wem wen qvo qva que ... ? investigate 𓎡𓆑

Ψψ Poseidon ⇔ Kar "The Snake" poison poisson (fish𓆑)
𐩢 heth ሐ PSI = HE!

VIR 𓆑

𐀞 pa' fēil 非 𐀸 vn 𐀺 > vir "male" ≈ man (3rd person) 𐘂 PA male පුරුෂ puruṣa පිරිමි pirimi (IS Sinhalese) ผู้ pûu pria > vir > hero > *uros@Ural > úr > е р er արու aru ἄρσην ársēn
